flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
• We will take a look at the Zeo Platform
  • The Data available with the Raw Data Library
  • How to put together a simple alarm using it.
guide.introduction_rendered:
• We will take a look at the Zeo Platform
  • The Data available with the Raw Data Library
  • How to put together a simple alarm using it.
Relevant parts
  • Zeo
  • FTDI 3.3V USB to Serial Cable (TTL-232R-3V3)
  • (optional) Molex clipping connector
  • (optional) Molex crimps
Tools
  • Wire cutter/stripper
  • needle or other sharp object

lines.text: Remove the pins from the header by gently prying up the plastic tabs and pulling the pins out.
lines.text_raw: Remove the pins from the header by gently prying up the plastic tabs and pulling the pins out.

lines.text: Cut one slot off the connector to make it a 5pin instead of 6.
lines.text_raw: Cut one slot off the connector to make it a 5pin instead of 6.

lines.text: Cut short all the wires except orange, yellow, and black.
lines.text_raw: Cut short all the wires except orange, yellow, and black.

lines.text: Reinsert the pins from left to right orange,yellow,black. (The remaining two slots will be empty)
lines.text_raw: Reinsert the pins from left to right orange,yellow,black. (The remaining two slots will be empty)

steps.title: Create a clipping interface cable (optional so it latches onto Zeo)

lines.text: Follow the same step as for the simple cable (cut short all wires except orange,yellow,black)
lines.text_raw: Follow the same step as for the simple cable (cut short all wires except orange,yellow,black)

lines.text: Cut the connector's side tabs and the extension on the top (see image).
lines.text_raw: Cut the connector's side tabs and the extension on the top (see image).

lines.text: Strip the remaining three wires and crimp on the crimps.
lines.text_raw: Strip the remaining three wires and crimp on the crimps.

lines.text: Insert the pins as for the simple cable (orange,yellow,black from left to right)
lines.text_raw: Insert the pins as for the simple cable (orange,yellow,black from left to right)

guide.summary: Use the Zeo sleep coach as a single channel EEG with sleepstage data.
guide.title: Using the Zeo Raw Data Library
